LanguageData.ReviaBloodRune.label: Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaBloodRune.description: A symbol of Skarne, carefully carved on an ornate disc. Vibrating with inner hatred.
LanguageData.ReviaBloodRuneBlank.label: Blood Rune (inert)
LanguageData.ReviaBloodRuneBlank.description: A symbol of Skarne, carefully carved on an ornate disc.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceBloodstone.label: bloodstone
LanguageData.ReviaRaceBloodstone.description: A blessing given by the Revian pantheon. Supposedly confers divine favour on the user.
LanguageData.ReviaGreaterBloodRune.label: Greater Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaGreaterBloodRune.description: A symbol of Skarne, carefully carved on a richly decorated disc. Pulsing with a malevolent, bloodthirsty spirit.
LanguageData.ReviaGreaterBloodRuneBlank.label: Greater Blood Rune (inert)
LanguageData.ReviaGreaterBloodRuneBlank.description: A symbol of Skarne, carefully carved on a richly decorated disc.
LanguageData.ReviaLesserBloodRune.label: Lesser Blood Rune
LanguageData.ReviaLesserBloodRune.description: A symbol of Skarne, carefully carved on a simple disc. Pulsing with inner aggression.
LanguageData.ReviaLesserBloodRuneBlank.label: Lesser Blood Rune (inert)
LanguageData.ReviaLesserBloodRuneBlank.description: A symbol of Skarne, carefully carved on a simple disc.
LanguageData.ReviaRacePalestone.label: palestone
LanguageData.ReviaRacePalestone.description: A lesser blessing given by the Revian pantheon. Supposedly confers divine favour on the user.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHaze.label: Red Haze
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHaze.description: A scarlet powder made from ground-up bloodstones. When taken, it is said that the user is given a small portion of Skarne's undying rage.
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeNeed.label: Red Haze
LanguageData.ReviaRaceRedHazeNeed.description: A strange, almost rabid bloodthirst grips this person. \n\nBloodstone powder appears to keep this almost uncontrollable fury away. Without it, however, this person degenerates into a berserk fury, attacking anyone and everyone around.
